mapper.select: select EXP_NAME as "name", EXP_CODE as "code"saveExpInfo from EXPRESS_CONFIG
mapper.insert: insert into EXPRESS_NEW_INFO (EXP_CODE, LOGISTIC, PUSH_TIME, EXP_NAME, TRACE) values (#{expCode}, #{logistic}, #{pushTime}, #{expName}, #{trace})
mapper.select: select ROW_ID as "rowId", EXP_CODE as "expCode", LOGISTIC as "logistic", PUSH_TIME as "pushTime", EXP_NAME as "expName", TRACE as "trace" from EXPRESS_NEW_INFO where LOGISTIC = #{logistic}

select ROW_ID as "rowId", ORDER_NO as "orderNo", LOGISTIC_CODE as "logisticCode", SHIPPER_CODE as "shipperCode", STATUS as "status", UPDATE_TIME as "updateTime", SENDER_CODE as "senderCode" from ORDER_EXPRESS_INFO where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and LOGISTIC_CODE = #{logisticCode}
mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_EXPRESS_INFO (ORDER_NO, LOGISTIC_CODE, SHIPPER_CODE, SENDER_CODE, STATUS, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{orderNo}, #{logisticCode}, #{shipperCode}, #{senderCode}, #{status}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select a.ROW_ID as "rowId", a.ORDER_NO as "orderNo", a.LOGISTIC_CODE as "logisticCode", a.SHIPPER_CODE as "shipperCode", a.STATUS as "status", a.UPDATE_TIME as "updateTime", a.SENDER_CODE as "senderCode", b.EXP_NAME as "expName" from ORDER_EXPRESS_INFO a, EXPRESS_CONFIG b where a.SHIPPER_CODE = b.EXP_CODE and a.STATUS = 0
select flag as "flag", value as "value" from SYS_CONFIG where flag in ('EBusinessId', 'AppKey','ReqURL')
mapper.update: update ORDER_INFO set ORDER_STATUS = case when ORDER_STATUS = 2 then 3 when ORDER_STATUS >= 3 then ORDER_STATUS end, LOGISTIC = #{logistic}, EXPRESS_CODE = #{expressCode}, EXPRESS_NAME = #{expressName}, DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId} where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and ORDER_STATUS >= 2
